text: The Yellow Line, formerly known as the Skokie Swift, is part of the Chicago Transit Authority's "L" system in Chicago, Illinois. The route runs from the Howard Terminal on the north side of Chicago, through the southern part of Evanston and to the Dempster Terminal in Skokie, Illinois, making one intermediate stop at Oakton Street in Skokie. At Howard, Yellow Line passengers can transfer to the Purple or Red Lines of the CTA. The Yellow Line is the only CTA line that does not go to Chicago Loop. ==Other websites== * Yellow Line at CTA official site Category:Transport in Chicago Category:1925 establishments in Illinois Category:1948 disestablishments Category:1940s disestablishments in the United States Category:1964 establishments in the United States Category:1960s establishments in Illinois Category:20th-century disestablishments in Illinois
title: Yellow Line (CTA)
